mapper.select: SELECT PAGE.PARENT_NAME, PAGE.PARENT_NUMBER, PAGE.PARENT_EMAIL, PAGE.CLASS_NAME, PAGE.CLASS_CONTENT, PAGE.CLASS_CATEGORY_BIG, PAGE.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, PAGE.CLASS_INTRO FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, P.PARENT_NAME, P.PARENT_NUMBER, P.PARENT_EMAIL, SAVE.CLASS_NAME, SAVE.CLASS_CONTENT, SAVE.CLASS_CATEGORY_BIG, SAVE.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, SAVE.CLASS_INTRO FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.*, C.CLASS_NUMBER, C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_CATEGORY_BIG, C.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, C.CLASS_CONTENT, C.CLASS_INTRO, C.CLASS_PAYMENT_ACCOUNT, C.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE FROM PRO P JOIN CLASS C ON P.PRO_NUMBER = C.PRO_NUMBER AND P.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber} ) CLASS JOIN CLASS_SAVE S ON CLASS.CLASS_NUMBER = S.CLASS_NUMBER ) SAVE JOIN PARENT P ON SAVE.PARENT_NUMBER = P.PARENT_NUMBER AND SAVE.PARENT_NUMBER = P.PARENT_NUMBER ) WHERE RN <= #{endRow} ) PAGE WHERE RN > #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRO P JOIN CLASS C ON P.PRO_NUMBER = C.PRO_NUMBER AND P.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber} ) INFO JOIN CLASS_SAVE CS ON INFO.CLASS_NUMBER = CS.CLASS_NUMBER
